page.title: 19COMPUTERS
page.content:
Many people now have computers.The popular computers are Sinclair machines.Over the past few years the price of machines has dropped dramatically.The reason most people in our school have computers are mostly so they can play games.Games are called software.Most people buy games on cassette but games are available on disc or cartridages.
{ SCHOOL COMPUTER STOLEN On May 13th 1985 the school computer was stolen.The thieves(thief)got onto the school roof.They (he,she)got through a sunroof and into the school.The next morning we found that the computer had been stolen.Other things had been stolen.Other things had been moved,and also a new radio cassette was stolen.
